txt.en: Destroy the Orc orders in a fire pit
Intercept Orc orders in Banám Lugaun
An Orc in Banám Lugaun must be carrying orders.\n\nYou should intercept Orc orders in Banám Lugaun.
You find a hastily scrawled missive containing Ugrukhôr's plans to take Minas Morgul
There must be at least one Orc in Banám Lugaun carrying orders.\n\nYou should intercept Orc orders in Banám Lugaun.
Intercept orders from an Orc in Banám Lugaun

The Orc encampment of Banám Lugaun watches Minas Morgul from across the Morgulduin River. The purpose of the camp is unknown, but you might learn something of it if you can intercept some Orkish orders.
Fire pits can be found in Banám Lugaun.\n\nYou should destroy the orders in a fire pit.
The Orc orders are instantly consumed by the flames
The knowledge of the orders and Ugrukhôr's plans to take Minas Morgul must be relayed to the Rangers of Ithilien as soon as you are able. They will surely want this information.
You read information about Ugrukhôr's plans to take Minas Morgul
An Orc camp sits between Minas Morgul and Cirith Ungol, and troops and supplies use it as they move through the treacherous terrain.
